DOC.brief_title: Adapalene-Benzoy Peroxide ( BPO ) Gel Treatment Acne Vulgaris 6-month Maintenance
DOC.detailed_description: This study follow-up RD.03.SPR.29074 - ACCESS I / NCT00688064 - `` Adapalene-BPO Gel Associated With Doxycycline 100 mg Treatment Severe Acne Vulgaris ''
DOC.criteria: Subjects complete previous study ( RD.03.SPR29074 NCT00688064 ) obtain least good Improvement ( Grade , 0 , 1 , 2 3 ) Female Subjects pregnant , nurse plan pregnancy study Subjects foresee intensive UV exposure study ( mountain sport , UV radiation , sunbathe , etc ) .
